name: Cube World
content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select Cube World setup executable
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Cube World/CubeLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating 32bit Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2012
    description: Installing Visual C++ 2012 libs.
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xact_jun2010
    description: Installing MS XACT Engine (32bits).
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: winhttp
    description: Installing WinHTTP.
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: orm=backbuffer
    description: Set orm=backbuffer.
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
